alert.note: Alert for Davis; Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 12:29PM MDT until June 03 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Southeastern Davis County in northern Utah... * Until 100 PM MDT * At 1229 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oquirrh, or near West Valley City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Millcreek, Kearns, Salt Lake City International Airport, Oquirrh, Mill Creek Canyon, Cottonwood West, Mount Olympus and East Millcreek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 295 and 313. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 114 and 133. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
